postCreateCommand: echo -n "$GPG_PRIVATE_KEY" | base64 --decode | gpg --import; echo "$GPG_PRIVATE_ID:6:" | gpg --import-ownertrust; go install github.com/emad-elsaid/xlog/cmd/xlog@latest; docker run --rm -it -v "$(pwd)/dns:/dns" ghcr.io/stackexchange/dnscontrol write-types; npm install -g live-server
